sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>dirt</radical> <radical>mask</radical> is a mask which, when put on, will greatly <kanji>increase</kanji> the amount of dirt.
meaningInfo: Imagine putting it on, and suddenly the dirt around you increases by quite a bit.
readingMnemonic: Use the dirt mask to <kanji>increase</kanji> the dirt around you. The <reading>zo</reading>mbies (<ja>ぞう</ja>) are trying to escape, so you just keep increasing the dirt on top of them so they can't get out.
readingInfo: Zombie hands keep coming out of the ground, but as long as you wear the mask and increase the dirt on top of them, they won't be able to escape their earthly prison.
